## Impact Assessment

**What will this decision affect?**

- [ ] CLI commands (`cmd/ado/`)
- [ ] Internal packages (`internal/`)

- [ ] Build/Release process
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Tests
- [ ] Dependencies
- [ ] Security
- [ ] Other: ___

## Scope Assessment

**Does this require an ADR?**

ADRs are **required** for:

- [ ] New architectural patterns
- [ ] Breaking changes to existing patterns
- [ ] New dependencies or tools
- [ ] Security-related decisions
- [ ] Changes affecting multiple components

ADRs are **optional** for:

- [ ] Single command additions (use Command Proposal instead)
- [ ] Bug fixes (use Bug Report instead)
- [ ] Documentation improvements
- [ ] Minor refactoring
